query: Surface code quantum error correction: technical deep dive for quantum engineers. Context: Comprehensive technical explanation needed. Goal: Provide implementation details, logical/physical qubit relationships, threshold requirements, and recent improvements. Focus areas: 1) Physical implementation on superconducting qubits with specific circuit designs, 2) Logical vs physical qubit overhead calculations and scaling laws, 3) Threshold theorem mathematical requirements and current experimental achievements (2023-2025), 4) Recent code distance improvements and logical error rate measurements. Success criteria: 5+ peer-reviewed academic sources, quantitative metrics and exact equations, recent experimental data from leading labs (Google, IBM, Delft). Prioritize Nature, Science, IEEE Quantum Engineering, and arxiv preprints from 2023-2025.
